metadata.title: CVE-2024-27306 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: aiohttp is an asynchronous HTTP client/server framework for asyncio andPython. A XSS vulnerability exists on index pages for static file handling.This vulnerability is fixed in 3.9.4. We have always recommended using areverse proxy server (e.g. nginx) for serving static files. Users followingthe recommendation are unaffected. Other users can disable `show_index` ifunable to upgrade.

criterions.comment: python-aiohttp package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
